attributes.action: Hold a General Election this year.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM told the people, prior to the last election, that he would serve a full term. I believe many people voted Labour simply because they were comfortable with the leadership and agenda of Tony Blair. He has now confirmed that he will not serve a full term. Therefore in the interest of democracy a General Election should be called when Gordon Brown (or whoever) takes over.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
